channel.title: Social Entrepreneurship on Nadia Humbert-Labeaumaz

item.title: What is a Social Entrepreneur?
item.description:
Today, social entrepreneurship is defined in many ways. This ambiguity can blur social entrepreneurs’ identity, undermine their credibility, weaken the relevance of the guidance they receive, and ultimately hinder their impact. That is why a shared definition is essential.

This article presents my perspective and insights into social entrepreneurs, based on primary research conducted with a small, random sample in Toronto, Canada.
